ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest Addicts Anonymous] A little trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, I don t need to worry about it. I turned in 5 more belts, got good faction, then got sick of it altogether. So, I traveled back to my hometown (this is my
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, I don't need to worry about it. I turned in 5 more belts, got
good faction, then got sick of it altogether. So, I traveled back to
my hometown (this is my 3rd time traveling back and forth between the
two) and i deposited all of my money gains from there, and i now have
over 100p (for the first time in Zakassis's lifetime) and actually
kept it there.


--- In everquestaddictsanonymous@y..., Dr Scurrilous PhD
<psychoinhell@y...> wrote:
> give up on freeport
> way too much trouble
>
> however Neriak is looking great now :)
> you can waste halflings and high elves around the spires
> and they give you faction boost in Neriak
> you loose faction with the high elves and halflings though
> but do you really care what the good softshells think?
> :P
